newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IDX Systems rated a hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IDX Systems rated a hold.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it has started coverage of IDX Systems Corp with a hold rating.

-- In a statement, Hambrecht said IDX has a strong business base providing information systems and services to the healthcare industry. But it is cautious about the near-term investment potential due to the company's planned acquisition of PHAMIS Inc and the stock's current valuation.

-- Hambrecht said PHAMIS has "ongoing operational hurdles" such as long sales cycles and delayed implementations, that cause concern. Also, it said the near-term upside potential is limited to the current stock price of 30-1/2.
